## ggplot2

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

## bar chart
```{r}
ggplot(data=iris, aes(x=Species, y=Sepal.Length, fill=Species)) +
    geom_bar(stat="identity") +
    guides(fill=FALSE)
```

## pie chart
```{r}
ggplot(data = iris,
  aes(x = factor(""), fill = Species) ) +
  geom_bar() +
  coord_polar(theta = "y") +
  scale_x_discrete("")
```

## scatter chart
```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width)) +
  geom_point()
```

## line chart
```{r}
ggplot(iris, aes(Sepal.Length, Sepal.Width)) +
  geom_line()
```

## line chart
```{r}
ggplot(data = iris, aes(x = Sepal.Length)) +
geom_histogram(fill="black", color="white")
```
